scripts.compile: npm run clean && node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc && copy src\requireConfig.js dist
scripts.test-firefox: npm run compile && node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --browser Firefox
scripts.test-edge: npm run compile && node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --browser Edge
scripts.test-ie: npm run compile && node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --browser IE
scripts.test-chrome: npm run compile && node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --browser Chrome
scripts.test-ci: npm run compile && node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf-ci.js
